source: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_SEQ_00<tab>Alisaie seems eager to discuss the council's decision with the other Scions.
target: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_SEQ_00<tab>レヴナンツトールのアリゼーは、石の家に入りたいようだ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_SEQ_01<tab>Having apparently had her fill of the hustle and bustle of the town square, Alisaie declares her intention to retire inside to await the return of her brother and the others. Join her in the Rising Stones.
target: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_SEQ_01<tab>アリゼーと話した。アルフィノたちの帰りを待つため「石の家」に入ろう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_SEQ_02<tab>Shortly after Alphinaud's arrival, a meeting is convened to discuss the outcome of the council. Hoping to convince the Griffin to abandon his course before war engulfs the realm, it is decided that Papalymo, Yda, Thancred, and Yugiri will brave the secret tunnels beneath Baelsar's Wall, and endeavor to confront the Resistance leader directly. You, meanwhile, are to stand ready in the Black Shroud for whatever eventuality may arise. Notify Alphinaud when you have made the necessary preparations.
target: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_SEQ_02<tab>石の家で「暁」の仲間たちと話し合った。無謀に思える鉄仮面の行動を阻止するため、パパリモとイダ、サンクレッド、ユウギリの4名がギラバニアへと向かうことになった。一方、冒険者はアルフィノとともに、黒衣森で待機して有事に備えることに。出発準備を整えたら、「アルフィノ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_SEQ_03<tab>Alphinaud urges you to conclude any business you have in Revenant's Toll, and meet him at the Hawthorne Hut in the East Shroud.
target: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_SEQ_03<tab>アルフィノと話した。まずは東部森林に向かい、ホウソーン家の山塞付近の「アルフィノ」と合流しよう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_SEQ_04<tab>Outside the Hawthorne Hut, you bid the infiltration team good fortune on their mission. After they depart, Alphinaud mentions that Amarissaix's Spire offers a clear view of the Wall, and suggests that you speak with the Alliance commanders who have gathered atop the lookout platform. Identify yourself to the serpent scout at the foot of the tower.
target: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_SEQ_04<tab>アルフィノと話し、パパリモたち潜入部隊と別れを告げた。どうやらアマリセ監視哨からであれば、バエサルの長城が監視しやすいらしい。東部森林のアマリセ監視哨の「双蛇党の斥候」と話そう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_SEQ_05<tab>It would seem that fighting has broken out on Baelsar's Wall. Scouts report that the Griffin has begun his assault, his soldiers apparently clad in Grand Company uniforms... Plainly, the Resistance leader will stop at nothing to drag the Alliance into his conflict. To make matters worse, your fellow Scions are headed into the eye of this storm, wholly unaware of what awaits them on the surface... Despite the danger, Alphinaud resolves to plunge into the thick of the battle in an attempt to save the day. You have little choice but to join your young friend at the approach to the Wall.
target: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_SEQ_05<tab>アマリセ監視哨の「双蛇党の斥候」と話した。ピピンたちと合流したところ、時を同じくしてバエサルの長城で騒乱が発生する。バエサルの長城へ突入すべく、東部森林にいる「アルフィノ」に話しかけよう。

source:
TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_SEQ_06<tab>Alphinaud outlines a simple plan wherein he will pursue the infiltration team through the tunnels while you scale the fortifications with a party of your most trusted comrades. You must reach the top of the Wall and force the Griffin to withdraw before the unthinkable happens!

※Challenge Baelsar's Wall with other players via the Duty Finder, or with a party of NPCs via Duty Support. Both systems are accessible from the main menu as well as the dungeon's entrance point.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_SEQ_06<tab>アルフィノと話した。バエサルの長城へは、東部森林の南東にある獣道から行けるらしい。鉄仮面の企みを阻止するため、「巨大防壁 バエサルの長城」を攻略しよう。

※進入地点を調べて「サポートNPCと突入」するか、メインコマンドの「コンテンツサポーター」を選ぶことで、サポートNPCと一緒に攻略できます。
※プレイヤー同士のパーティで攻略する場合は、コンテンツファインダーから攻略に参加してください。

source: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_SEQ_07<tab>You have overpowered the Griffin. See events to their conclusion before making your escape from the top of the Wall.
target: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_SEQ_07<tab>鉄仮面を名乗っていたイルベルドを倒した。事態を収束させ脱出しよう。

source:
TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_SEQ_08<tab>Beneath the mask, the Griffin is revealed to be none other than Ilberd, the disgraced captain of the Crystal Braves. Following his “defeat,” the Resistance leader enacts his true plan─a ritual to summon a nightmarish primal empowered by Ala Mhigan desperation and the might of Nidhogg's eyes. Fearing a disaster to rival the Calamity itself, Papalymo steps forward with Tupsimati, and grimly begins to weave a forbidden magick of confinement... You barely have time to escape on Hilda's airship before the incantation swallows Papalymo and encases the newborn entity in a vast cocoon of light.

Stunned by the unexpected summoning and the loss of her dearest friend, Yda's irrepressible spirit seems to have been broken at last. Offer her what comfort you may.
target: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_SEQ_08<tab>イルベルドは「竜の眼」を用いつつ味方と自分自身の絶望を束ね、神降ろしを画策した。これに対してパパリモは、名杖トゥプシマティを手に命がけの封印魔法を試みる。大混乱に陥ったバエサルの長城から、ヒルダが操る飛空艇で脱出を果たしたものの皆が呆然としていた。「イダ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_SEQ_09<tab>You attempt to speak with Yda, but there seems to be nothing you can say that will pierce the shroud of her grief. Thancred offers to watch over her whilst you and the others return to the Rising Stones with the tidings of Papalymo's demise.
target: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_SEQ_09<tab>イダと話したが、相棒の喪失に彼女は混乱し、動揺を隠せない様子だ。今はそっとしておくしかないだろう。イダの様子は、サンクレッドが見守ってくれるという。情報共有のため、アルフィノは石の家へ戻ろうと告げるのだった。

source: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_TODO_00<tab>Enter the Rising Stones.
target: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_TODO_00<tab>石の家へ入る

source: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Alphinaud.
target: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_TODO_01<tab>アルフィノと話す

source: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Alphinaud near the Hawthorne Hut.
target: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_TODO_02<tab>ホウソーン家の山塞付近のアルフィノと話す

source: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_TODO_03<tab>Speak with the serpent scout at Amarissaix's Spire.
target: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_TODO_03<tab>アマリセ監視哨の双蛇党の斥候と話す

source: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_TODO_04<tab>Speak with Alphinaud.
target: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_TODO_04<tab>アルフィノと話す

source: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_TODO_05<tab>Use the Duty Finder to climb Baelsar's Wall.
target: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_TODO_05<tab>「巨大防壁 バエサルの長城」を攻略

source: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_YUGIRI_000_001<tab>Even now, I am astonished by how closely Mistress Alisaie resembles Master Alphinaud. Their very mannerisms are alike. From a distance, I should be hard-pressed to tell one from the other─until they opened their mouths, of course...
target:
TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_YUGIRI_000_001<tab>本当に似ているな、
アルフィノ殿とアリゼー殿は……。
歩き方のクセまで、これほど似ているとは驚きだ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_ALISAIE_000_010<tab>Well, as much as I enjoy the bustle of the Toll, I think it's time we headed inside. My brother and the others will not be long.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_ALISAIE_000_010<tab>さてと……こんな場所で突っ立てても仕方ないわね。
「石の家」に入って、アルフィノたちの帰りを待ちましょう？

source: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_YSHTOLA_000_020<tab>Ah, you are returned from the council. But what of Alphinaud? Did some other matter require his attention?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_YSHTOLA_000_020<tab>お帰りなさい。
どうやら会合は無事に終わったみたいね。
ところで、アルフィノたちの姿が見えないようだけれど……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_ALPHINAUD_000_021<tab>Mine apologies, friends. I trust we have not kept you waiting overlong.
target: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_ALPHINAUD_000_021<tab>すまない、待たせてしまったかな？

source:
TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_YDA_000_022<tab>Greetings, everyone!
Oh, Krile─how's Naago doing? She <var 1A 02 /var>will<var 1A 01 /var> be all right, won't she?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_YDA_000_022<tab>たっだいまー！　あっ、クルル！
ナーゴの様子はどう？

source: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_KRILE_000_023<tab>I don't see why not. She's sleeping at the moment. Tataru is keeping an eye on her, so we'll know soon enough if there's any change in her condition.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_KRILE_000_023<tab>安心して、今は別室で眠っているわ。
タタルさんが見ていてくれるから大丈夫よ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_YSHTOLA_000_024<tab>Her wounds are healing well. With sufficient rest, I am certain she will make a full recovery.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_YSHTOLA_000_024<tab>私も様子を見てきたけど、
傷口も塞がったようだし、後は安静にしておけば快復するはずよ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_YDA_000_025<tab>Thank goodness for that.
target: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_YDA_000_025<tab>よかった……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_YSHTOLA_000_026<tab>Now, mayhap you would share with us the council's decision?
target: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_YSHTOLA_000_026<tab>それで……会合の方はどうだったのかしら？

source: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_ALISAIE_000_027<tab>Each of the nations, Ishgard included, has committed to providing military support to Gridania. The Eorzean Alliance will soon have a significant force in the Black Shroud, ready to respond to any imperial act of aggression.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_ALISAIE_000_027<tab>イシュガルドをはじめとする各国が、
援軍を黒衣森に派遣することになったわ。
エオルゼア同盟軍が戦力を集結させて、有事に備えるってわけ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_YDA_000_028<tab>You know, I almost wish the council would stop messing around and give the Griffin what he wants. I wouldn't like to be the imperial caught between the Resistance and the Alliance!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_YDA_000_028<tab>でもさ、エオルゼア同盟軍が勢揃いするなら、
鉄仮面の計画に乗っかって、帝国軍を攻めちゃえばいいじゃん。
アラミゴ側とグリダニア側から、挟み撃ちにできちゃうよ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_PAPALYMO_000_029<tab>Yda, you cannot seriously─ One does not lightly go to war with the Garlean Empire.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_PAPALYMO_000_029<tab>まったく……考えなしの発言はやめてくれ。
強大な帝国との戦争が、そんなに軽々しく始められるものか。

source: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_ALPHINAUD_000_030<tab>Quite. To open hostilities without due consideration would be to invite disaster. <sigh> If only there were some way to reach the Griffin─some means to convince him to abandon this reckless course...
target:
TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_ALPHINAUD_000_030<tab>あぁ、入念な準備もなく、帝国と事を構えるのは得策ではない。
どうにかして鉄仮面たちに、作戦を思いとどまらせることが、
できれば良いのだが……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_PAPALYMO_000_031<tab>It may not be entirely unfeasible.
target: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_PAPALYMO_000_031<tab>それについては、方法がないわけじゃない……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_PAPALYMO_000_032<tab>There is a network of tunnels beneath Baelsar's Wall─secret passages dug by the Resistance to provide a way out of Ala Mhigo.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_PAPALYMO_000_032<tab>バエサルの長城の地下には、
アラミゴ解放軍の闘士たちが掘り抜いた秘密坑道があるんだ。
亡命希望者を逃がしたりするためのね……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_YSHTOLA_000_033<tab>...Which may equally serve as a way in?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_YSHTOLA_000_033<tab>……つまり、そのルートで何人かをアラミゴ側に送り込んで、
鉄仮面と接触、計画を思いとどまるよう説得するということ？

source: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_PAPALYMO_000_034<tab>Precisely. If all are in agreement, I would be the one to undertake the necessary negotiations. I am familiar with the route, and the Resistance is familiar with me.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_PAPALYMO_000_034<tab>そのとおり。
もし賛同が得られるのなら、僕が行ってくるよ。
道にも明るいし、アラミゴ解放軍にも接点があるからね。

source: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_YDA_000_035<tab>About as familiar as they are with <var 1A 02 /var>me<var 1A 01 /var>, you mean? Say what you want─I'm coming too!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_YDA_000_035<tab>ちょっと、抜け駆けするつもり？
そーゆーことなら、アタシも行くからね。
第一、解放軍にツテがあるのは、アタシなんだから！

source: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_YUGIRI_000_036<tab>I have some experience in the practice of infiltration. If you would have me, my services are at your disposal.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_YUGIRI_000_036<tab>……敵地への潜入任務となれば、忍びの技も役立つだろう。
その任、私も参加させてもらいたい……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_THANCRED_000_037<tab>As are mine. It has been far too long since I shared a shadow with a shinobi, and I do not intend to waste the opportunity.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_THANCRED_000_037<tab>よし、俺も同行させてもらおう。
久しぶりにユウギリ殿と共闘するのも悪くない。

source: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_YSHTOLA_000_038<tab>Four is quite sufficient for an infiltration mission. Greater numbers will only serve to increase the risk of detection. Krile and I will direct our energies elsewhere. What of you Leveilleurs?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_YSHTOLA_000_038<tab>どうやら話は決まったようね……。
そうとなれば、私とクルルは別の任務に向かうわ。
アルフィノ、あなたたちはどうするつもり？

source: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_ALPHINAUD_000_039<tab>I will return to the East Shroud, and stand watch over the border. Should matters take a turn for the worse, 'twould seem wise to be on hand.
target: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_ALPHINAUD_000_039<tab>私は有事に備えて、東部森林で待機するつもりだ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_ALPHINAUD_000_040<tab>Might I prevail upon you to accompany me, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? Gridania will be safer for your presence. And...while it may not seem the most thrilling duty, dear sister, might I ask that you remain at the Rising Stones to pass on messages and so on?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_ALPHINAUD_000_040<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>、君も来てくれると助かる。
アリゼーは、悪いが「石の家」に残って連絡役を頼みたい。

source:
TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_ALISAIE_000_041<tab>To <var 1A 02 /var>hold the fort<var 1A 01 /var>, you mean.
...Very well. I suppose the task must fall to someone.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_ALISAIE_000_041<tab>ひとり留守番だなんてね……。
まぁ、いいわ。誰かがやらなきゃいけない役回りだもの。

source: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_ALISAIE_000_042<tab>Safe travels, all of you.
target: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_ALISAIE_000_042<tab>……みんな、気を付けてね。

source: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_ALISAIE_000_045<tab>I suspect Tataru would have little trouble facilitating communication between our forces under normal circumstances. But I concede she has her hands full nursing that Resistance fighter back to health. No matter: my turn in the field will come.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_ALISAIE_000_045<tab>タタルがいれば、連絡役を任せられるけど、
解放軍の人の看病もあるんでしょうし……。
ま、仕方ないわね。

source: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_YDA_000_050<tab>All I'm saying is that it wouldn't be the worst thing if we ended up joining the Griffin's fight against the Empire. I mean, it's going to happen sooner or later, isn't it?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_YDA_000_050<tab>鉄仮面もさ、もっとエオルゼア同盟軍と協力すればいいのに。
ガレマール帝国は「共通の敵」ってやつでしょ？

source: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_PAPALYMO_000_055<tab>...I may perhaps have exaggerated my standing with the Resistance a little. But I am confident that I have a reasonable chance of putting a stop to this madness before events spiral out of control. Yes, fair-to-middling at the very least...
target:
TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_PAPALYMO_000_055<tab>接点があるとは言ってみたけど、
鉄仮面の部隊とは、さほど深い繋がりがあるわけじゃない。
それでも接触できれば、足止めくらいはできるさ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_YUGIRI_000_060<tab>My fellow shinobi required little encouragement to take their place amongst the Alliance forces massing in Gridania. They are most eager to cross blades with the armies of Garlemald once more.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_YUGIRI_000_060<tab>レヴナンツトール開拓団に所属している忍びたちに、
同盟軍と連携して動くように指示を出しておいた。
久しぶりの帝国相手の戦だと、喜んでいたよ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_THANCRED_000_065<tab>I am no ninja, but I did spend some few moons in the Sharlayan homeland learning how to move unseen. Between Yugiri and my humble self, Yda and Papalymo will be well protected.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_THANCRED_000_065<tab>ドマの忍びとは違った流儀ではあるが、
俺も、シャーレアン本国で潜入任務の訓練は受けている。
しっかり、イダやパパリモたちをエスコートしてみせるさ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_ALPHINAUD_000_070<tab>If you have any unfinished business in the Toll, pray attend to it now. I would depart for the Hawthorne Hut without delay.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_ALPHINAUD_000_070<tab>準備はいいかい、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>。
ひとまず東部森林の「ホウソーン家の山塞」に行こう。
彼の地には、双蛇党の拠点があるからね。

source: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_ALPHINAUD_000_071<tab>The nearby watchtower offers an unobstructed view of Baelsar's Wall, and I should be interested to speak to the Alliance commanders who have installed themselves at its top.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_ALPHINAUD_000_071<tab>そこで同盟軍の動向を確認してから、
バエサルの長城が望める場所に向かうとしよう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_ALPHINAUD_000_080<tab>Ah, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, there you are. Come, Amarissaix's Spire awaits.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_ALPHINAUD_000_080<tab>少しばかり先に着いたから、
双蛇党の士官たちに話を聞いておいたよ。
どうやら同盟軍の将校が、アマリセ監視哨に集まっているらしい。

source: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_ALPHINAUD_000_081<tab>The Alliance officers on the platform should be able to apprise us of any developments at the Wall.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_ALPHINAUD_000_081<tab>あの監視哨は、帝国軍の拠点を臨む場所にある。
バエサルの長城を監視するためにも、好都合なのだろう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_THANCRED_000_082<tab>Fancy meeting the two of you here. We were about to set forth.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_THANCRED_000_082<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>、アルフィノ、ここにいたか……。
俺たちは、そろそろ出発しようと思う。

source: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_ALPHINAUD_000_083<tab>Indeed. I was about to say, “Twelve watch over you,” but I doubt you have need of divine protection, even if you <var 1A 02 /var>are<var 1A 01 /var> venturing into enemy territory...
target:
TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_ALPHINAUD_000_083<tab>あぁ、手練れ揃いだから心配はしていないが、
それでも、ギラバニアは帝国の支配下にある敵地だ。
くれぐれも気を付けてくれよ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_YDA_000_084<tab>Don't worry, Alphinaud─we'll have the Griffin by the scruff of the neck before you know it!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_YDA_000_084<tab>任せといてよね！
鉄仮面の首根っこをひっ捕まえてやるんだから！

source: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_PAPALYMO_000_085<tab>Do make up your mind, Yda. Nary a moment ago, you seemed ready to shake the Griffin by the <var 1A 02 /var>hand<var 1A 01 /var> rather than the neck. So, which is it to be? 'Twould be best to decide <var 1A 02 /var>before<var 1A 01 /var> we enter into negotiations.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_PAPALYMO_000_085<tab>やれやれ……鉄仮面と共闘しようと言い出したかと思えば、
今度は、ひっ捕まえるときたか……少しは考えて発言してくれよ。
僕たちの使命は、説得交渉なんだ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_YDA_000_086<tab><var 1A 02 /var>Trust me<var 1A 01 /var>, Papalymo: I'll shake whatever needs shaking. The talking part I leave to you!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_YDA_000_086<tab>わかってるって。
難しいことはパパリモに任せるからさ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_PAPALYMO_000_087<tab>...I think I feel a headache coming on. Let's be on our way, shall we?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_PAPALYMO_000_087<tab>……まったく、頭が痛くなってきたよ。
それじゃ、行ってくる……。

source:
TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_ALPHINAUD_000_088<tab>Ah, some things never change...
Well then, shall we make for the spire? Our Alliance friends will doubtless have news for us.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_ALPHINAUD_000_088<tab>イダとパパリモは、相変わらずといった感じだな。
さあ、我々も出発しようか……。
「アマリセ監視哨」にいる双蛇党の斥候に状況を確認しよう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_SERPENTSCOUT_000_089<tab>Welcome, Warrior of Light. I assume you are here to speak with our commanding officers?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_SERPENTSCOUT_000_089<tab>「暁の血盟」の方々ですね？
ちょうど、ここアマリセ監視哨にて、
同盟参加国の将校たちが集まることになっております。

source: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_SERPENTSCOUT_100_089<tab>You will find them on the observation platform. Pray proceed.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_SERPENTSCOUT_100_089<tab>関係者全員がそろい次第、
会合が開かれる手はずになっておりますので、
ぜひ、出席なさってください。

source: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_PIPIN_100_090<tab>Greetings, my friends. 'Tis good to see you both well.
target: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_PIPIN_100_090<tab>よく来てくれた、ご両人。

source: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_HILDA_100_091<tab>I was hopin' you might turn up. I've dragged half the watch here, see, and the sight of you might help remind 'em why we bothered.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_HILDA_100_091<tab>誰かと思えば、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>じゃないか。
イシュガルドからは、アタシたちの部隊が、
出張ってきてるよ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_RASHAHT_100_092<tab>If memory serves, I have not seen many of you since the day of the grand melee. Having borne the brunt of your blows, may I say what an honor it is to stand at your side!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_RASHAHT_100_092<tab>この面子がそろうのも、四国合同演習のとき以来だね。
こうして、同じ戦列に立てるなんて、光栄だよ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_ALPHINAUD_100_093<tab>'Tis heartening indeed to see the realm's most stalwart defenders thus gathered in common cause. Speaking of which─what news from the Wall?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_ALPHINAUD_100_093<tab>各都市の精鋭が集まっているようで、心強い。
それで……「長城」に動きは？

source: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_VORSAILE_100_094<tab>All has been quiet.
target: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_VORSAILE_100_094<tab>今のところは、いつもの様子と変わりはないようだが……

source: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_VORSAILE_100_095<tab>Report! <var 1A 02 /var>What<var 1A 01 /var>? Seven hells... Fighting has broken out on top of the Wall! A full-scale assault!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_VORSAILE_100_095<tab>配下の観測班より報告！
長城にて、戦闘が発生している模様……！

source: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_PIPIN_100_096<tab>So the Griffin has made his move.
target: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_PIPIN_100_096<tab>やはり、鉄仮面が動いたかッ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_VORSAILE_100_097<tab><var 1A 02 /var>Someone<var 1A 01 /var> has...
target: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_VORSAILE_100_097<tab>そ、それが……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_HILDA_100_098<tab>And what's that s'posed to mean?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_HILDA_100_098<tab>どういうことだい？
懸念があるなら、ハッキリ伝えておくれよ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_VORSAILE_100_100<tab>The attackers, they─ They're wearing Grand Company colors.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_VORSAILE_100_100<tab>こ、攻撃部隊が、
各国のグランドカンパニーの制服を着用しているとの報告が……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_RASHAHT_100_101<tab>Impossible. We gave no such order.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_RASHAHT_100_101<tab>そんな……あたしたちの部隊は、
動いてなんかないよ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_ALPHINAUD_100_102<tab><var 1A 02 /var>Of course...<var 1A 01 /var> The Wall was never the Griffin's target─it was bait. We have been goaded into deploying our armies nearby, thus lending weight to this deception!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_ALPHINAUD_100_102<tab>やられた！　鉄仮面の狙いはこれか！
各国のグランドカンパニーを装って、攻撃することこそが目的！
長城の奪取など、最初から計算外なんだ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_VORSAILE_100_103<tab>If those uniforms were convincing enough to deceive my scouts, the Empire will surely think we've launched an offensive. This could mean war!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_VORSAILE_100_103<tab>そ、そうか……帝国軍からすれば、
我らエオルゼア同盟軍が侵攻してきたように見える。
そうなれば、戦火は確実に……！

source: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_ALPHINAUD_100_104<tab>Even so...this may yet be no more than a diversion. With the armies of the Alliance occupying the Empire's attention, it would be comparatively easy for the Griffin's supporters to slip into Ala Mhigo.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_ALPHINAUD_100_104<tab>それすらもオトリの可能性が高い。
エオルゼア同盟軍と帝国軍をやりあわせて隙を作り、
自分たちは後背のアラミゴへと向かう……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_ALPHINAUD_100_105<tab>He could then incite a rebellion amongst the populace which the imperial reserves would be hard-pressed to contain. Eorzea, meanwhile, would be plunged into chaos.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_ALPHINAUD_100_105<tab>そして、都市部で虐げられている民衆を煽り、
反乱を起こさせれば、絶対的な兵力不足を補えるはずだ。
このままでは、同盟軍は体よく利用されるだけだぞ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_ALPHINAUD_100_106<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, we must make for the Wall at once.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_ALPHINAUD_100_106<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>、
今すぐ「バエサルの長城」に向かおう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_PIPIN_100_107<tab>What, just the two of you!?
target: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_PIPIN_100_107<tab>そんな無謀な！

source: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_ALPHINAUD_100_108<tab>Our companions embarked on a mission to sway the Griffin from his course, and are likely halfway to his command post by now. They will emerge in the midst of a raging battle and I do not mean to abandon them to their fate.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_ALPHINAUD_100_108<tab>鉄仮面の作戦を阻止しようと、
仲間の潜入部隊が、長城に向かっているのです。
彼らを救い出す必要がある！

source: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_ALPHINAUD_100_109<tab>It will be dangerous, aye, but the confusion may work to our advantage. If we are careful to avoid the skirmishing, it may yet be possible to reach the Griffin...and if we can do that...
target:
TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_ALPHINAUD_100_109<tab>危険は承知の上……奇襲を受けて帝国軍が混乱している今なら、
割って入ることもできましょう。
あわよくば、鉄仮面に兵を退かせることも……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_PIPIN_100_110<tab>Lady Hilda─might I ask that you have an airship ready to bear the Scions to safety?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_PIPIN_100_110<tab>クッ……。
ヒルダ殿、脱出用の飛空艇の用意をお願いしても？

source: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_HILDA_100_111<tab>Ha! I don't know who this <var 1A 02 /var>Lady<var 1A 01 /var> Hilda is, Marshal, but you can count on me.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_HILDA_100_111<tab>任せな！
イシュガルドで一番速い飛空艇を用意するよ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_RASHAHT_100_112<tab>We must prepare for imperial reprisals. May the Navigator guide us through the storm!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_RASHAHT_100_112<tab>それじゃ、あたしたちは帝国の動きに備える！
みんな、死ぬんじゃないよ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_IRONMASK_100_113<tab>Forward, comrades! The time has come to drive the Empire from Ala Mhigo, and force action upon those who have turned their backs to our suffering for so long!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_IRONMASK_100_113<tab>いけ、アラミゴを救う勇士たちよ！
我らの一撃により、惰眠を貪るエオルゼアの民を目覚めさせ、
悪しき帝国軍を、故郷より放逐する足掛かりとするのだ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_IRONMASK_100_114<tab>Let this victory be the first step in the liberation of our homeland!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_IRONMASK_100_114<tab>この一戦の勝利こそが、
アラミゴの明日へと通ずると知れ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_IRONMASK_100_115<tab>Ala Mhigo will be free─no matter the cost.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_IRONMASK_100_115<tab>俺は必ずアラミゴを取り戻してみせる……
どんな手を使ってもな！

source: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_ALPHINAUD_000_100<tab>From what Papalymo told me, the trail ahead should lead us into the shadow of the Wall.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_ALPHINAUD_000_100<tab>パパリモからの情報によれば、
この先の獣道を使えば、「バエサルの長城」に接近できるようだ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_ALPHINAUD_000_101<tab>As we have two objectives, I suggest we divide our forces. I shall make straightways for the tunnels, and attempt to intercept our comrades ere they stumble into a bloodbath.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_ALPHINAUD_000_101<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>、ここからは二手に分かれよう。
私は帝国軍の防衛網を突破して、最短距離で長城に接近……。
秘密坑道に入って、パパリモたち潜入部隊を呼び戻しにいく。

source: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_ALPHINAUD_000_102<tab>While I do so...I must ask that you scale the Wall. Know that I would not propose such a course if there were any other way. But the time for subtlety is past. Take a band of your most trusted companions and cut a path through to the Griffin. Make him see reason─by any means necessary.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_ALPHINAUD_000_102<tab>君は、少数の手勢を率いて
「バエサルの長城」に取り付いて、その頂を目指してもらいたい。
何としても鉄仮面に、部隊を引きあげさせるんだ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_ALPHINAUD_000_103<tab>Once we are free of the tunnels, we will make for your position with all due haste. And if everything proceeds according to plan, Hilda will then swoop in and spirit us all away to safety. I only pray that we have enough time.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_ALPHINAUD_000_103<tab>私は、潜入部隊と合流した後、すぐに君たちの後を追う。
ヒルダたちに連絡をつけて、脱出路も確保しておくつもりだ。
ここからは、迅速な行動が物を言う……頼んだぞ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_SERPENTSCOUT_000_110<tab><var 08 E905 ((Milady)) ((Sir)) /var>! As per Marshal Tarupin's orders, we will provide a feint to cover your advance. May the Crystal light your way forward!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_SERPENTSCOUT_000_110<tab>ピピン少闘将からの命により、
みなさんの突入を支援するため、陽動を担当させていただきます。
クリスタルの導きがあらんことを！

source: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_YUGIRI_000_115<tab>I understand only too well the desire to reclaim one's homeland...but I cannot condone such slaughter.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_YUGIRI_000_115<tab>何に代えてでも、祖国を取り戻したいという気持ちはわかる……。
わかってしまうがゆえに歯がゆく、そして許しがたいのだ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_THANCRED_000_120<tab>Papalymo knew what he was doing. I could not refuse him.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_THANCRED_000_120<tab>……パパリモの眼は、
覚悟を決めた男の眼だった……。
たとえ恨まれてでも、俺は……クソッ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_PIPIN_000_125<tab>It has been explained to me what that light represents, and I have ordered our forces to stand ready. It seems we can do little else but wait...
target:
TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_PIPIN_000_125<tab>話は聞いた……あの輝きが蛮神召喚の証であったとは……。
全軍に出撃態勢を整えるようには命じたが、
今しばらくは事態を静観するしかあるまいよ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_ALPHINAUD_000_130<tab>How many more must we lose...?
target: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_ALPHINAUD_000_130<tab>なんてことだ……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_HILDA_000_135<tab>Every Ishgardian gets taught that the Sea of Clouds churns in the grip of the warrin' elements of water and wind. Enough to tear you apart, they say. No one's <var 1A 02 /var>ever<var 1A 01 /var> gone to the bottom of the abyss and lived to tell the tale. So how did that bastard manage to get his hands on Nidhogg's eyes?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_HILDA_000_135<tab>雲海ってのは水と風の属性の力が渦巻く、文字どおりの海だ。
その底に立ち入って、生きて帰ってきた者はいない……。
どんな魔法を使って「竜の眼」を回収したっていうんだい！？

source: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_YDA_000_140<tab>Why...?
target: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_YDA_000_140<tab>どうして……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_YDA_000_141<tab>Why didn't they let me stay!?
target: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_YDA_000_141<tab>どうして、アタシを残してくれなかったの……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_YDA_000_142<tab>Papalymo is my friend! I should have been there with him!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_YDA_000_142<tab>どうして！　アタシは、パパリモの相棒なんだ！
だから、アタシは……！！

source: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_THANCRED_000_143<tab>You could see it in his eyes, Yda. He knew what he was doing─what had to be done.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_THANCRED_000_143<tab>長年の付き合いだからわかる。
パパリモの眼は、覚悟を決めた男の眼だった。

source: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_THANCRED_000_144<tab>Master Louisoix wore that same look, right before the end...
target: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_THANCRED_000_144<tab>……そう、ルイゾワのじいさんと同じ眼だ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_YDA_000_145<tab>Do you think I don't know that!? I know, all right! <var 1A 02 /var>I know.<var 1A 01 /var>
target: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_YDA_000_145<tab>アタシだってわかってるよ……でも……！

source: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_THANCRED_000_146<tab>There is nothing more you could have done. Ilberd caught us all off guard. Even <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> was powerless to stop him.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_THANCRED_000_146<tab>お前が残ったとて、できることはなかった。
<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>も全力を尽くしてくれたんだ。
奥の手を知らない状況で、イルベルドを止められたわけでもない。

source: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_THANCRED_000_147<tab>If you must blame someone, then blame me. Just promise that you will never forget what Papalymo strove to protect, or the lessons he tried to teach you.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_THANCRED_000_147<tab>恨むなら、俺を恨め、イダ。
だが、パパリモが何を守り、
何を託そうとしたのかだけは、決して忘れるなよ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_YDA_000_148<tab>...Don't. Don't speak to me.
target: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_YDA_000_148<tab>……パパリモ…………。

source: TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_THANCRED_000_149<tab>Leave Yda with me. Go on. Go back to the Rising Stones. The others need to know what happened here.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNF104_02354_THANCRED_000_149<tab>イダのことは、俺が見ていよう……。
お前たちは「石の家」に戻って、
アリゼーたちと情報共有を頼む……。
